Text: if you have any doupts about an AVI format torrent you can start downloading it and once it gets to 5-10% you can try to play it in VLC media player(freeware) which will repair the file and will play a few scenes or at least a bit of the audio while a fake torrent will not be repaired and will just run through and show nothing but a moving slider, try it out for yuourself and you can delete those fakes long b4 they finish downloading and pls copy and paste this to any posts you suspect to be fakes, let ppl find out for themselves and we can at least make the movie company anti p2p campaigners job a little harder
